mapper.select: select b.p_no as p_no, b.p_name as p_name, to_char(a.rsv_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi') as reservedate ,a.rsv_no ,a.rsv_name as rsv_name ,substr(b.p_rnum,0,8) as p_rnum, b.p_sex as p_sex from reservation a, patient b where a.p_no = b.p_no and a.d_id = #{dId} and to_char(a.rsv_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.rsv_status = 1
